div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo die mensis
Aprilis Anno quo supra

the saide day Alexander menyeis aldirman In presence of the counsale and with thar' avis' offerit
to Duncan fyf procurator to thomas fyf his fadir ane nethis fischiningis of the pott
for this yer' Ande the saide Duncan denyit that his fadir hed' ony richt to the
saide fischingis of the pott Ande refusit vtirlie to tak it or Intromett tharwith

The saide day the aldirman and thomas leslie ane of the ballieis of the said' burghe
In the townis nayme chargit and ordanit Duncan fyf procurator to thomas fyf his
fadir to decist fra the Occupeing and fischeing of ane half nethis fisching of
the Raik

The said day Duncan fyf said' to the aldirman he walde nocht decist fra the occupeing
and fischeing of ane demi nethis of the Raik / becaus' his fadir has pait his girssome
for the samyn and offerit him to prewe it the toune assignand' to him ane day

The said' day the aldirman ballieis Consale and diuers' of the communite present for the tyme
licencit and levit Johne fyf ane of thar' Sangsteris to pas' to the sculis for
his profit and lair' with preuilege to bruk his clerkschip quhilkis he has of tham
and resauit and entirit Wate strathachin to the seruing of the samyn for ane yer' as
he and mastir fyf Aggreis

The said' day the aldirman ballieis and counsal grantit to gif Wille Wricht fiwe
Schillingis in the yer' and sere Androw Colisone Collector Accidental' of Abirdene and mastir
Alexander fif In the name of the chaplannis grant to ger gif vthir fiwe schillingis
In the yer' to the said' Wille for his gude seruice to be done to by him ane
govn'

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis at commavnde and avis' of the Counsale chargit
the four' officiaris sergeandis of the saide burghe' to pas' to the wattir of the Raik
and thar' diuyde and part thomas fyffis half nethis fra sere Johne ruthirfurdis half
nethis and put Alexander of mairis half nethis to the saide sere Johne ruthirfurdis
half nethis to marrowe and streik to giddir in the saide wattir and fisching of
the Rak

The saide day the aldirman In presence of the Counsale and thomas leslie ane of the
ballieis of the said' burghe' ordanit and Assignit Alexander mar' to marrowe ande
streik his half nethis with sere Johne ruthirfurdis half nethis

The saide day Richerde litster lauchfullie warnit be Williame scrimgeor and
nocht comperit tile Ansuer' tile sere Johne ruthirfurde for the distruction' and slauchtir
of his scheipe with his doggis vnlauchfull bestis and tharfor the aldirman and balyeis
ordanit the saide Officiar' to pas' to the saide Richerde and tak ane stres' and latt
it Agane to borghe and it be askit and warne him to Comper one monunday the
vj day of maij next to cum et cetera tile Ansuer' to the said' knicht In the saide Actioun'

The said day Johne Waus tuk to preiwe one monunday the vj day of maij
next to Cum that the fische takin avay be Wate Dougles was slane in ther' wattir

add.foreign: continuacio plegij inter thomam Ridall et Willelmum

div.p:
The saide day the aldirman and ballieis with consent of Williame Colp one that ane
part Ande thomas Redaill one that vthir continewit the borghe' fundin be the saide
thomas one the saide Williame as procurator to Dauy Colp his sone to this day xv
dais the xiij of maij In ale siclik strintht force and effect as it is this day
but preiudice or skatht tile ony partj

Eodem die Johanes fyf fecit constituit creauit et Nominauit magistrum Alexandrum fyf suum legittimum
procuratorem Actorem factorem et mandatum specialem et cetera dans et concedens eidem ac suis subscriptis suam
plenariam potestatem ac mandatum speciale suum officium clericatus chorj de Abirdene regendum
et deseruirj faciendum commoditates et profitua eiusdem petendum exigendum et recipiendum
et de Receptis acquitandum Ac In omnibus aliis actionibus Ipsum concernens Agendum prosequendum
defendendum et promittens de Rato et grato Cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem sexto die
mensis maij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day ser Johnne ruthirfurd one that ane part And richerd litstar
one that vthir part summitit thame be the faithtis of thar bodies to stand'
at the ordinance of Robert blinseill Johnne lesly of Warderis Dauy menyes
Alexander rede ande Williame portar anent the skatht done to the said knychtis
scheipe be the said Richerd' dogis quhilkis personis tul oblist thame to gif furth'
thar deliuerance in the said betuix this and the xiiij day of maij Instant'

The said day patry reid allegit that Johnne the Waus hade failyet in his preiwe
that he tuk to preiwe the fische slane in to thar wattir that Walter Douglas' intro
metit witht

The said day the bailye thomas lesly continewit the oppinnyng of the witnes pro
ducit be Johnne the Waus agane Walter Douglas' Anent the slauchtir of ane
lax to friday that nixt cumis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo die maij
anno quo supra

The saide day ouchtirlouny the widew of vmquhile harrouar'
grantit that scho hede ane Croice of Siluer giltit pertening to the spous' of
Williame nicholsone and that scho hede hir bedis of the samyn in hir handis
Ande Williame scrimgeour officiar at commavnde of the ballies chargit the
saide to Remane in the tolbutht quhile scho restoire agane the
saide croice and bedis to the spous' of the saide Williame nicholsone

The saide day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome that
Jonhne Waus hede preuit sufficientlie that the fische takin be Wat Dougles
was slane in thar' avne wattir and the saide Wat was quyt of the wrang
wis' takin and Intrometting with the saide Salmonde fische

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiijo
die maij Anno quo supra

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne Colisone
Cullane forspekar Anent the borghe' fundin one gilbert litstar be Duncan
Colisone for the wranguis withhaldin fra him of xxxij s' that the saide
Duncan sale avis' with his aithe quhile friday that next cumis and
that day he sale depone be his aithe quhat is pait tile him
or allouit of the said' xxxij s' and quhat that restis clerly be
the said' Duncanis aithe vnpait the saide gilbert sal pay to the
said' Duncan

head.add: continuacio plegij inter colp et Ridall

div.p:
Eodem die plegium inter Willelmum colp et thomam Ridale per assisam ex
ore Johannis Cullane prelocutoris eiusdem continuatur vsque ad feriam sextam proximam
futuram absque preiudicio presencium quia dicta assisa nesciuit dictum plegium
decernere

The saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Duncan Colisone forspekar that thome Androu Couplande is feit seruand'
to Johne nicholsone yongar quhile Witsonday cum ane yer'
and aw to mak him seruice to the saide terme

The saide day the aldirman ballieis and Counsal present for the tume conducit
and feit Wille Coupar sangstar to Witsonday cum ane yer' and forthir Induringe
thar will to mak gude seruice in his office of clerkschipe and segnistarschipe
as efferis to the plesour of gode and thame he havande the profitis of his said'
office siclik as he has hed' and Josit it this yer' bigane Ande sere Androw
Coupar oblist him Souerte to the toune for the saide Williamez gude seruice

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xv die maij
anno quo supra

The said' day Williame loremar' was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Dauid menyeis
forspekar for the bying of yrne for the quhilkis he was in
ane Amerciament of the court and aw to Restoir' the samyn Agane

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvijo die maij
anno quo supra

add.foreign: plegius pro Introitu Willelmi loremar et cetera suorum complicium

div.p:
The saide day Alexander prat come Souerte be his landis and gudis tile entir Williame
loremar personaly befor the seref of Abirdene or his deputis ane of may in the seref court
of Abirdene to be haldin within the tolbutht of the burghe of Abirdene one monunday the
xxtj day of maij Instant or one settirday the first day of June next to Cum at the
plesour of Ab my lord of Abirdene tile ansuer' for' Spoliacioun' of yrne
spulyet fra the saide lorde And' thome menyes come souerte tile entir Johne fechat
In manere and forme as said' tile ansuer' for the spoliacioun of jC suethin burdis
fra the said' lorde et cetera

head.add: the franchman Rede Cullan et cetera

div.p:
The saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Robert blinsele forspekar
that nicholes franchman sal deliuer iiijC eln' of canuas' tile Alexander rede and Androw
Cullane and resaue xl stane of woll

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' mastir Androw Cadiow for
spekar that thai coude nocht decid' nor determe anent the borghe' fundin be
thome ridale vpone William colp procurator to Dauiy Colp anent the frethin of
his pundis takin for x s' of annuele becaus' the grund' of that matir dependis
befor our Souerane lorde and his lordis of counsale the partiis being vndir summite

The saide day the action' follouit be Richerd' franchman apone Johne fechat
anent the harnasing of ane sadile Is continevit to monunday that next cumis
becaus' the preuis was nocht present

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die mensis
maij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day malcome crag procurator for Jonet Wastland grantit that sche
sulde mak the landis that sche has in coniunctfeftment als' gude as thai war
quhen' sche intrometit witht' thame eftir the decess' of Jhonne Wastlande
hir husbande

The said day Dany tailyour grantit tile ansuer to the borghe' peremptourly
fundin one him be malcome crage procurator for Jonet traill for the wranguis'
Occupacioun' of ane pece of ane yard' and ane capoun and avay takin of ane
capoun' cruyff one friday that nixt cumis

The said day Jhonne Wormet lauchfully callit and nocht comperit to ansuer'
to the borghe' fundin one him be Androw meldrum for the wranguis' withhalding
fra him of vij s' tharfor the bailyes chargit Androw nauchtj to warne the said'
Jhonne' to ansuer' to the said borghe' one friday that nixt cumis as thrid day of
process'

The said say Jhonne of mar' requirit the thre bailyes to mak him pament
of tene li' v optenit vpone Jhonne fechat

The said day the bailyes assignit friday that nixt cumis to sande brabner to ansuer'
to the borghe fundin one him be William smytht hatmakar for vij hattis price
of the pece xxx d' wranguisly haldin fra him et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxiiij die maij anno quo supra

The saide day Robert hay grantit that he was borghe'
to Johne arthouris for j barrell of tar' price xv s' quhilk the
ballieis ordanit the said' Robert to pay within terme of law
to the sade Johne Ande the saide Johne grantit that the said' barrele
of tar' was thomez meldrumis his gude fadiris

The saide day Comperit Johne of Kintor and schew that Agnes Andirson'
his modir was liand' bedseik throw strubulance done tile hir'
be Dauy colp for the quhilkis scho mycht nocht comper befor nay Juge to persewe Justice
for the offence done tile hir

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis offerit thame Redy to do
Justice to the saide Agnes and Dauy Colp in strubulance and ale vthiris
actionis debatabile betuix thame

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne
Kintor forspekar that Sandy brabner aw to pay to Williame
smitht hatmakar vij hattis Ilkan wortht xxxtj d' quhilkis the
balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Dauid menyeis forspekar that the borghe' fundin
on Dauy talyour hed' be malcum of crag procurator for Jonet traile for the wranguis occupa
cione of ane pece of yarde pertening to the said' Jonet in coniunctfeftment was of vaile for
the quhilkis the said Dauy was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera and to Amend' as law will et cetera
and forber' in tyme to cum

The saide day the assis' be the moutht of William blinsele forspekar of the samyn declarit
thai coud' nocht determe one the strubulance betuix Dauy talyour' and malcum of crag and continevit
the samyn to this day viij dais
